product_name: NRS Earl 6 Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard 10' 6"
long_description: Featuring high volume for big paddlers, the packable NRS Earl 6 Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard offers all-around performance for fitness paddling, touring, river running and light surfing.
short_description: Featuring high volume for big paddlers, the packable NRS Earl 6 Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard offers all-around performance for fitness paddling, touring, river running and light surfing.
